description:
The show takes place in a futuristic city, where science has greatly progressed. A race of aliens called the Jurals invade the Earth to steal its resources, and Ken Izumi must become the superhero Chargeman Ken to stop them.
Source: Wikipedia
Note: The order of the Episodes on the DVD Release were scrambled a lot. (See Japanese Wikipedia)

REGULAR.description:
Young Ken Izumi, his sister Caron, and their annoying robot sidekick Barican must save the local amusement park from the sinister Juralians. Watch for the scene where Ken rolls two feet off the ground, thanks to an animation error!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 危機!!! 子供宇宙ステーション

REGULAR.description:
It`s Caron`s birthday, and the Juralians crash the party to challenge Chargeman Ken. For some reason, Ken accepts and walks into the obvious trap.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians have a cunning plan: killer butterflies that eat human cells! The solution to this problem will likely involve a lot of dead butterflies.
Source: crunchyroll

A new student at Ken`s school has stolen every girl`s heart. So, why does he want to get Ken alone to show him his special secret? Absolutely nothing dirty happens in this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

Ken and his class take a trip to Hokkaido, where they`re attacked by a Juralian mummy riding in a horse drawn carriage. Good thing Ken never leaves home without his trusty Alpha Gun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu! Miira ga Basha de Yatte Kuru
Terror! The Mummy Comes by Carriage!
恐怖! ミイラが馬車でやってくる

REGULAR.description:
Ken and his class (with Caron and Barican tagging along) take a trip to the space botanical garden, filled with exotic alien plants. It would be a shame if they somehow came to life and began to attack, wouldn`t it?
Source: crunchyroll

Ken, Caron, and Barican travel to a futuristic Old West theme park inhabited by killer robots who exist to be gunned down by the human guests. You might have caught the recent remake of this episode on HBO.
Source: crunchyroll

After Ken saves a woman who turns out to be a Juralian spy, she finds she can`t bring herself to kill Ken! This won`t end well.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians create a robot kaiju to attack Earth ships. The episode is most notable for a fight between Ken and Barican that serves no purpose whatsoever.
Source: crunchyroll

In a stunningly logical move, the Juralians capture Ken and his family and prepare to execute them. Their only hope? Barican. Note - At no point does Barican actually ever run amuck.
Source: crunchyroll

A runaway planet is going to destroy Earth, which would be bad news for both the humans and the Juralians. The solution? Team up, for this one time only!
Source: crunchyroll

Caron`s on a health kick, and the Juralians are destroying all the vegetables on Earth. It`s up to Ken to return vegetables to dinner plates everywhere, earning him the eternal scorn of every other child on Earth who isn`t Caron.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 野菜サラダが食べられない

REGULAR.description:
Ken`s class is off on yet another field trip, this time to an undersea city. But this time, the alien menace is a duplicate of his teacher, Miss Nagisa!
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians bring the famous giant Buddha statue of Kamakura to life and set it on a rampage. The result is fantastically sacrilegious!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Daibutsu That Vanished into the Night

REGULAR.description:
Ken`s class (Which apparently only goes on field trips) visits an art museum, but the students are vanishing. Could it be a Juralian plot? Could it be anything else?
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians unleash their most fiendish plot yet: a record of the show`s background music that sucks the life from the listeners!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 殺人レコード 恐怖のメロディー

REGULAR.description:
The Juralians kidnap Dr. Yoshizaka to force the secret of Ken`s weakness from him. It turns out that Ken`s weakness is...losing his Alpha Gun!
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians stir up a prisoner revolt and breakout from a giant prison. Can Ken somehow stop the Juralians without killing their human stooges?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Escape from Prison Island

REGULAR.description:
Caron rollerskates straight into a bank robbery and is taken hostage. Then she`s captured by Juralians!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 銀行ギャング キャロンが危ない

REGULAR.description:
Ken meets a pretty girl named Miyuki and is immediately smitten. And Barican doesn`t like that, at all! Nothing about this is remotely suspicious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ガールフレンドが出来た

REGULAR.description:
Caron gets a pretty doll from a secret admirer. But what sinister orders does it whisper to her as she sleeps?
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians attack with the physical facsimile television, able to transmit weapons into vital Earth facilities. It`s up to Ken to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

This episode is stunning in its portrayal of the mentally ill and probably couldn`t be rebroadcast in Japan today. Features a doctor who wants to blow up Europe. Not a country in Europe, just...Europe.
Source: crunchyroll

Barican is invited to join a secret robot club. A club that meets in the graveyard? Would anyone want to join a club that would have Barican as a member?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Invitation to the Robot Club
ロボットクラブへの招待状

REGULAR.description:
Yuuichi is Ken`s classmate, and he`s taken to petty arson in response to his parents fighting all the time. But the Juralians want to use his fiery talents for something bigger...
Source: crunchyroll

Another pretty girl, another obvious Juralian trap. The eventual showdown in the amusement park is a series highlight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Girl Who Lost Her Memory

REGULAR.description:
Ken`s classmates are acting strange, not paying attention in class and sneaking off to sample funny mushrooms. It`s like a classic afterschool special, only with a dose of alien murder!
Source: crunchyroll

A human scientist at a rocket factory is aiming to sell secret plans to the Juralians, but then he double crosses them! That...isn`t a smart thing to do, as he soon learns. Can Ken save him? Will Ken even want to save him?
Source: crunchyroll

A fashion model has seen something she shouldn`t, and now the Juralians are after her! This episode features some really precious "futuristic" fashion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ファッションモデルを消せ!

REGULAR.description:
In an obvious nod to King King, an ugly Juralian takes Caron hostage and climbs to the top of a tower with her. Ken is especially brutal in this one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Save Caron from the Top of the Tower!
塔上のキャロンを救え!

REGULAR.description:
A human stadium owner is ready to sell out humanity to help the Juralians bomb it. Only a poor little mute girl who seems to have wandered in from another series entirely can warn Ken! Watch for an animation glitch at 2:46 where you can see the camera operator`s hands in the shot!
Source: crunchyroll

Sousuke Furuyama is a newly released convict who just wants to get back to his family and live an honest life. Too bad the Juralians have a need for his talents.
Source: crunchyroll

Yes, Mamoru. Your dad is very old fashioned. This time around, the Juralians` sinister plan is...to help a man hang himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boku no Papa wa Jidai Okure?
僕のパパは時代おくれ?

REGULAR.description:
The Juralians are trying to sabotage an underground industrial site in the remote mountains of Japan. This time, Ken will have to take Sky Rod underground to save the trapped workers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sky Rod, Burrow into the Earth`s Depths!
スカイロッド 地底に突っこめ!

REGULAR.description:
If you see only one episode of Chargeman Ken, let it be this one. It has it all: technical incompetence, a bizarre alien plot, and Ken at his sociopathic worst. Please forgive him, Dr. Volga!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 頭の中にダイナマイト

REGULAR.description:
In a genuinely horrifying move, the Juralians plot to poison pregnant women all over Japan to produce malformed babies. But Ken stands ready to deliver some blazing atomic justice!
Source: crunchyroll

Ken and his family have the bad luck to pick a flight that gets hijacked. The hijackers have the bad luck to pick a flight filled with Juralians who are all there to kill Ken!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハイジャックをやっつけろ!

REGULAR.description:
A lonely rich boy wants to be friends with Ken. For some reason, Ken still can`t see that nobody wants to be his friend except for murderous Juralians.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ジュラルのニセ友情作戦

REGULAR.description:
Mom and Caron are off to the beauty parlor. A beauty parlor...of death!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bijin Robot wa Koroshi no Shisha
The Pretty Robot Is a Herald of Death
美人ロボットは殺しの使者

REGULAR.description:
Another standout episode, featuring an interminably slow "race". Nobody ever seems to question this 10-year-old boy driving his 7-year-old sister around in a car.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 疾走! 殺人ハイウェイ

REGULAR.description:
Yet another Dickensian child gets used by the Juralians in a plot to steal aircraft designs. This episode features a bag of bees and a girl who is clearly voiced by an adult man using a falsetto.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians need someone to penetrate a secure military base to allow them entry. Naturally, they once again force a child to help them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Air Force Base Is Targeted!
空軍基地が狙われている!

REGULAR.description:
Ken`s developed a sudden interest in kendo...and in the new assistant instructor at his dojo. He`s clearly a Juralian in disguise, but what`s he up to?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: カメラのファインダーを覗け!

REGULAR.description:
Ken`s been out sick, and his teacher Miss Nagisa decides to pay a call. But something seems different about him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 研の偽者をやっつけろ!

REGULAR.description:
When the clock strikes three, it`s time for Caron to kill! This episode features a knife-wielding Caron, child abuse, and terrible piano playing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: When the Cuckoo Clock Strikes Three
鳩時計が3時を指したら

REGULAR.description:
Apparently, parents in 2074 are totally cool with letting a bunch of 10-year-olds just ride off with the clothes on their back and stay in the homes of strange old ladies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terror! The House of the White-Haired Crone!
恐怖! 白髪老婆の家

REGULAR.description:
The Juralians aren`t fooling around anymore, and have decided to attack en masse. The king is certain that Chargeman Ken can`t possibly stop them. The king is clearly mistaken.
Source: crunchyroll

Ken awakens on a desert island, captive to a Juralian disguised as an old woman. Worse, his voice is gone, and without it, he can`t transform!
Source: crunchyroll

Ken`s classmates are being bullied by a very dangerous juvenile delinquent. Somehow, this ends up with Ken in a bike race, fighting for his life.
Source: crunchyroll

A rich benefactor seems to be adopting an awful lot of orphans, but none of his references check out. Maybe they should investigate them BEFORE handing over the orphans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みなし子センターを救え!

REGULAR.description:
Ken and Caron adopt an old abandoned dog. Warning: this episode contains terrible dog abuse from psychotic children and dangerous aliens.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians have targeted an undersea oil field staffed by robots. Hurry, Ken! The oil must flow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blow Up the Undersea Oil Field!

REGULAR.description:
Marriage! A joyful occasion...unless your bride is an alien in disguise!
Source: crunchyroll

Stranger than the fact that waxworks are still a thing in 2074 is that the figures are coming to life at night and driving the watchman mad!
Source: crunchyroll

In a clear abuse of his hero powers, Ken and Barican take a joyride to Africa, crash in Egypt, and yet somehow still manage to run into Juralians. This is one of the very few episodes where the show seems self-aware.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ones They Met in Egypt
エジプトで出会ったやつ

REGULAR.description:
Ken is invited to try out horseback riding. As might be expected, this ends up with vehicular equus-cide.
Source: crunchyroll

Ken and his family take a fun trip to the Antarctic Amusement Park. As usual, the Juralians aren`t about to let anyone have any fun!
Source: crunchyroll

Ken, Caron, and Barican want to see the circus, but don`t have any money. Good thing that friendly clown decides to just let them in. Surely this won`t end in crowds fleeing in panic.
Source: crunchyroll

A couple of hunters learn that the only thing worse than getting on Ken`s bad side is stumbling upon a secret Juralian base in the middle of the woods.
Source: crunchyroll

The Juralians have invented a tsunami weapon, and it`s dragged beachgoers down to a watery prison...including Ken`s family! Can he save them before they`re gassed to death?
Source: crunchyroll

In a shocking twist, a robot shows up claiming to be Barican`s old friend, and everyone seems to love him! But, why can`t Barican recall ever having met this weirdo?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Barican`s Old Friend Pays a Visit
Barikan no Kyuuyuu ga Tazunete Kita
バリカンの旧友が尋ねて来た

REGULAR.description:
The staff of a giant farm have vanished, and from that pile of charred corpses in the farm house, we can assume there`s been foul play!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 農業コンビナートの危機

REGULAR.description:
A night at a prize fight ends in murder...and for once, it`s not by Ken! There are Juralians in the house, and Ken`s about to get on tonight`s fight card!
Source: crunchyroll

The cities of Earth depend on massive central control centers to function, and the Juralians are destroying them, one by one! Ken has to move fast, before civil order completely collapses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 爆発! マンモスコントロールタワー

REGULAR.description:
After 64 episodes of continual defeats, the Juralians launch their mightiest and deadliest offensive. It`s time for Ken to settle things, once and for all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 勝利! チャージマン研
